Class Level1

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • LevelBase
        • Level1
  • public class Level1
extends LevelBase
    This builds the level 1 world Uses methods from LevelBase to build the level
    Version:
    2019/11/13
    Author:
    Dante Romey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Level1​(int n)
      Constructor Calls the methods from levelbase that are required to build the level Also calls spawnOthers and spawnWalls because those are specific to each level The int n parameter is used for spawning in the correct number of players

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      act Calls the method needed for the level to function
      void levelAdvance()
      levelAdance Detects if there are no more rubies in the world, if so, advances the level to the next one
      void spawnOthers()
      spawnOthers spawns in the other object for the level such as ghosts, spikes, and speed items
      void spawnWalls()
      spawnWalls Spawns in the wall obstacles specific to each level

      • Methods inherited from class LevelBase

        deleteRubies, spawnBorder, spawnPlayers, spawnRubies, spawnSB, spawnTraps

      • Methods inherited from class greenfoot.World

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
